mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room(acc_id, type_code_id, status_code_id, type_code_code, status_code_code, main_image_id, name, info, add_info, size, room_cnt, floor, capacity, max_capacity) VALUES(#{accId}, #{typeCodeId}, #{statusCodeId}, #{typeCodeCode}, #{statusCodeCode}, #{mainImageId}, #{name}, #{info}, #{addInfo}, #{size}, #{roomCnt}, #{floor}, #{capacity}, #{maxCapacity})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.id, r.acc_id,
r.type_code_id, r.type_code_code, tc.code_name AS type_code_name,
r.status_code_id, r.status_code_code, sc.code_name AS status_code_name,
r.main_image_id, r.name, r.info, r.add_info, r.size, r.room_cnt, r.floor, r.capacity, r.max_capacity, r.created_at, r.updated_at
FROM room r LEFT JOIN code tc ON r.type_code_id = tc.code_type_id AND r.type_code_code = tc.code
LEFT JOIN code sc ON r.status_code_id = sc.code_type_id AND r.status_code_code = sc.code
WHERE r.id = #{id}
